DOC.brief_summary: This project aims to assess the clinical and microbiological efficacy of fosfomycin(FOM) in patients with bacterial infection. Primary objective: â€¢ To assess clinical and microbiological efficacy of FOM in patients with bacterial infection. Secondary objectives: - To determine the rate and severity of unexpected adverse events. - To determine the mean duration of therapy with FOM in patients with bacterial infection. Study design: Multi-center, non-interventional study
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of the Efficacy of FOSFOMYCIN in Patients With Bacterial Infection
DOC.detailed_description: Please note that InfectoPharm Arzneimittel und Consilium GmbH has taken over sponsor responsibilities for all German sites of this clinical trial with Jannuary 2016 from J&P MEDICAL RESEARCH LTD.
DOC.criteria: Patients with bacterial infection receiving FOM for clinical purposes will be included into the analysis.
